mapper.select: SELECT /* [com.coway.trust.biz.common.mobileAuthorization.impl.MobileAuthMenuMapper.selectMobileRoleAuthMappingAdjustList] 20191029 - KR HAN */ t1.AUTH_CODE AUTH_CODE ,t2.MENU_LVL MENU_LVL ,t2.MENU_CODE MENU_CODE ,t2.MENU_NAME MENU_NAME ,t2.PGM_CODE PGM_CODE ,t2.PGM_NAME PGM_NAME FROM MOB0003M t1 JOIN MOB0002M t2 ON t1.MENU_CODE = t2.menu_code WHERE t1.AUTH_CODE IN ( /* 선택한 권한의 매핑된 Role의 상위 권한 */ SELECT f.auth_code FROM ( SELECT c.role_id , d.auth_code FROM SYS0044M c , (SELECT a.role_id, a.auth_code FROM SYS0053M a , SYS0054M b WHERE a.auth_code = b.auth_code AND a.role_id = b.role_id AND a.auth_code = #{authCode} ) d WHERE c.role_id = d.role_id(+) START WITH c.role_id = d.role_id CONNECT BY c.role_id = PRIOR c.parent_role) e , SYS0054M f WHERE e.role_id = f.role_id ) START WITH t2.UPPER_MENU_CODE IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR t2.MENU_CODE = t2.UPPER_MENU_CODE ORDER SIBLINGS BY t2.MENU_ORDER
